casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Reynaldo H. OCHOA, Defendant, and
Aegis Security Ins. Co., Surety. No. 312P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Kenneth P. Andresen, Charlotte, for Aegis Security Ins. Co. Robert E. Wilhoit, Alan V. Pugh, Asheboro, for Randolph Co. Bd. of Education.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of June 2005 by Surety (Aegis Security Insurance Company) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
